30.brief: I come or go with, accompany, assemble
30.long: I come or go with, accompany; I come together, assemble.

30.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
30.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
a council, tribunal; the Sanhedrin, the meeting place of the Sanhedrin.
I lead down, bring down, either from a high place on land or to a lower (or actually to the sea-coast), or from the high seas to land.

trans: (a) I make to stand, place, set up, establish, appoint; mid: I place myself, stand, (b) I set in balance, weigh; intrans: (c) I stand, stand by, stand still; met: I stand ready, stand firm, am steadfast.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.

30.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
30.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
